name: Last Light (itch) (Karlofsky)
description:
In a world overrun by demons, you're the surviving last hope. 

To eliminate the evil you must protect Marigold from harm, while she casts a spell that will restore balance to the land.

This is game was a collaboration  for the "Themed Horror Game Jam #9 - Halloween Edition". We used theme 3: Hope Dies Last while incorporating:

  • Hourglass Bonus - The timer in this game is a hourglass
  • Don't Give Up Bonus - The player receives encouraging messages throughout the game.

Let us know how far did you get! 

The first player that makes it through round 100 gets a fictional cookie.

WASD - Move

Left Mouse Button - Attack

Enter - Confirm option
